attributes.action: Make single vaccines available on the NHS as an alternative to the MMR.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the government has hereto refused to carry out clinical trials to investigate Andrew Wakefield's theory of a link between MMR and a specific bowel disease related to a form of autism, we would like single vaccines made available as an option on the NHS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
